name: Reflection (itch) (Gary)
description:
Have you ever wondered what would happen if a mirror isn’t just a reflection, but an entire alternate dimension?

Reflection is a 2D platform game that has the player trapped inside of an alternate dimension. Together with the assistance of a Drone, help Test Subject 8 survive, escape and conquer the depths of this deadly, nightmarish world. Let’s just hope that you are the only ones here.

Features:

  • Travel and explore between two different yet familiar dimensions, each with multiple challenging levels and secrets
  • Encounter a diverse cast of characters, each with unique personalities and abilities
  • Created and developed by one human
  • 01000101 01010010 01010010 01001111 01010010

WARNING!

This game may potentially trigger seizures for players with photosensitive epilepsy or similar conditions.

EARLY ACCESS!

This game currently contains 3 different levels + 2 secret levels.

 More levels and features are being developed.
